entry.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 6, 19:00 - 21:00 UTC

Mar 17, 22:25 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 06/04/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 06/04/2023 21:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on customers' projects. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, nor performance issue are expected.

End time : 15/03/2023 21:00 UTC
Service impact : At one point, a short downtime of no more than 10 minutes will be experienced. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a infrastructure maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade except at one point.
